description:
Ronaldo, Hiyoshi, and Mikazuki are stuck in a blizzard with some vampires, Handa and Sanzu duke it out, and Draluc`s old teacher comes to Shin-Yokohama.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atatamete Kure to Itte Kure / Legend of Ronalist / Tokoyo no Machi wa Hyoushoukyou to Waltz o Odoru
Please Suggest Warming Each Other Up / Legend of the Ronaldist / Waltz with the Smiling Ice Lord in the Town of the Eternal
Qu`on se tienne chaud, quoi ! / Legend of the Ronalduelliste / La ville valse au bras du Seigneur Givré
温めてくれと言ってくれ / レジェンド オブ ロナリスト / 常世の町は氷笑卿とワルツを踊る
